20101229023424.000|20101229023425.000|CC1|A SKI LIFT SNAPPING, DROPPING   
20101229023425.000|20101229023426.000|CC1|SKIERS 30 FEET.                 
20101229023426.000|20101229023426.000|CC1|THIS IMAGE OF ONE OF THOSE      
20101229023426.000|20101229023427.000|CC1|DANGLING CHAIRS CAPTURED BY A   
20101229023427.000|20101229023431.000|CC1|SKIER TODAY.

20101229023435.000|20101229023435.000|CC1|MOUNTAIN IN MAINE, AND JEREMY   
20101229023435.000|20101229023436.000|CC1|HUBBARD IS THERE THIS EVENING.  
20101229023436.000|20101229023437.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD EVENING,      
20101229023437.000|20101229023437.000|CC1|DAVID.                          
20101229023437.000|20101229023438.000|CC1|IT IS STILL VERY WINDY HERE     
20101229023438.000|20101229023438.000|CC1|TONIGHT.                        
20101229023438.000|20101229023439.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS ARE TRYING TO     
20101229023439.000|20101229023440.000|CC1|FIGURE OUT IF WIND IS WHAT      
20101229023440.000|20101229023440.000|CC1|CAUSED THIS ACCIDENT.           
20101229023440.000|20101229023441.000|CC1|NINE PEOPLE WERE TAKEN TO THE   
20101229023441.000|20101229023441.000|CC1|HOSPITAL.                       
20101229023441.000|20101229023442.000|CC1|SEVERAL OTHERS INJURED.

20101229023445.000|20101229023446.000|CC1|AND AS YOU SAID, SKIERS WITH    
20101229023446.000|20101229023447.000|CC1|CAMERAS CAPTURED WHAT HAPPENED  
20101229023447.000|20101229023448.000|CC1|NEXT.                           
20101229023448.000|20101229023449.000|CC1|THE PICTURES REVEAL THE HORROR  
20101229023449.000|20101229023451.000|CC1|FOR THE SKIERS ON THE MOUNTAIN. 
20101229023451.000|20101229023452.000|CC1|REBECCA LONDON WAS ON ONE OF THE
20101229023452.000|20101229023453.000|CC1|LIFTS THAT FELL.                
20101229023453.000|20101229023456.000|CC1|>> IT HAPPENED SO FAST.         
20101229023456.000|20101229023458.000|CC1|I DIDN'T HAVE TIME TO BE AFRAID.
20101229023458.000|20101229023501.000|CC1|THEY KIND OF LURCHED BACK AND   
20101229023501.000|20101229023502.000|CC1|THEN I DIDN'T REALIZE WE JUST   
20101229023502.000|20101229023503.000|CC1|DROPPED.                        
20101229023503.000|20101229023504.000|CC1|>> WE WERE ABOUT SIX CHAIRS UP  
20101229023504.000|20101229023507.000|CC1|FROM WHERE IT FELL, AND MY MOM  
20101229023507.000|20101229023508.000|CC1|FELL OFF, AND SHE'S IN THE      
20101229023508.000|20101229023509.000|CC1|HOSPITAL RIGHT NOW WITH A       
20101229023509.000|20101229023511.000|CC1|CRACKED RIB.                    
20101229023511.000|20101229023513.000|CC1|>> MY DAUGHTER AND I IMMEDIATELY
20101229023513.000|20101229023515.000|CC1|WENT DOWN TO START HELPING OUT, 
20101229023515.000|20101229023516.000|CC1|GET CHAIRS OFF OF PEOPLE.

20101229023518.000|20101229023518.000|CC1|OUT FROM UNDER THE CHAIRS

20101229023519.000|20101229023520.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SKIERS SNAPPED

20101229023525.000|20101229023527.000|CC1|AIR, THE SNAPPED WIRES FROM THE 
20101229023527.000|20101229023527.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 1:02:00 of 1:30:00
20101229023527.000|20101229023528.000|CC1|LIFT DANGLING OVERHEAD.         
20101229023528.000|20101229023529.000|CC1|EVENTUALLY, THEY WERE ALL SAFELY
20101229023529.000|20101229023530.000|CC1|RESCUED.                        
20101229023530.000|20101229023533.000|CC1|>> PRETTY SCARY.                
20101229023533.000|20101229023534.000|CC1|BECAUSE -- WE WERE UP THERE FOR 
20101229023534.000|20101229023536.000|CC1|A REALLY LONG TIME, SO -- WE    
20101229023536.000|20101229023536.000|CC1|DIDN'T WANT ANYTHING ELSE TO    
20101229023536.000|20101229023538.000|CC1|HAPPEN.
